title: Looking for a Ranked Team :)
body:
Hey guys, just wondering, if your team is already gold or something and someone new joins, would he/she be in gold as well?

Anyways, I'm looking for a decent ranked team :)

I main JG{{champion:35}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:5}} , but I'm decent at top{{champion:86}} {{champion:92}}{{champion:23}}   and mid{{champion:30}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:91}}  :P

I don't do ADC nor Supp much, but I can play {{champion:12}} as a supp :)

replies.body: They get the gold icon next to their name, but they don't get end of season rewards unless they have won at least 10 games in the ranked team.
To be fair gold teams usually consist of High gold to low diamond (in some cases) players.  So if you need it for the rewards, probably not the best bet
yes you do get gold rewards if u win 10 games with that team. But i think you should earn those rewards in solo q joining a ranked team just for rewards is sort of cheating
You would of had to played at least 5 or so games with the team
